concept.title: Text sorting and direction
concept.shortdesc: Learn how to adjust text sorting using the sort-as and index-sort-as elements and change text direction using the dir element.

section.title: Sorting text using the sort-as element
section.p: In languages like English you can easily sort lists by alphabetical order. But text in languages such as Japanese and Chinese cannot be always sorted that way. This is because the same character can have different pronunciations depending on the meaning.
